meanings.definition: A movement or action in a game or activity
meanings.sent1: It's your turn to roll the dice and move your game piece.
meanings.sent2: The player took his turn at bat and hit a home run.
meanings.sent3: Her turn to draw a card in the game revealed a surprise twist.
meanings.sent4: The chess player carefully planned his next turn to checkmate his opponent.
meanings.sent5: In the game of charades, his turn to act out the word was hilarious.
